channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are Trump's tariffs a bargaining chip for a new global economic order?
item.description: It's not just tariffs. The White House is rethinking the central role of the dollar in the global economy.

item.title: Witkoff meets Putin as Trump urges Russia to 'get moving'

item.description: Markets react to the latest escalation in the U.S. and China trade war; CBS' Gayle King prepares for journey to space on Monday.

item.title: Boca Raton small plane crash kills 3 and injures 1, authorities say

item.title: US pastor kidnapped during church service in South Africa
item.description: Police say four armed and masked men abducted the pastor in his car on Thursday evening.
